description: Möbius transform of A003960 (with alternating zeros omitted).
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = [(p-1)/2][(p+1)/2]^(e-1). - _David W. Wilson_, Sep 01 2001
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(f = factor(2*n-1)); for (i=1, #f~, p = f[i, 1]; f[i, 1] = (p-1)/2*((p+1)/2)^(f[i,2]-1); f[i, 2] = 1); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 27 2015
author: _Marc LeBrun_
extensions: More terms from Reiner Martin (reinermartin(AT)hotmail.com), Aug 15 2001
Further terms from _David W. Wilson_, Aug 29 2001
